InstallationGuideSection.title: Installation Guide
InstallationGuideSection.step1: From your Shopify Admin, go to Online Store > Themes.
InstallationGuideSection.step2: Click the Customize button of your active Theme
InstallationGuideSection.step3: Click on Add Section anywhere in the sidebar or on Add Block in the "Product information" Section.
InstallationGuideSection.step4: Select Value Propositions from the list of sections/blocks.
InstallationGuideSection.step5: Click on the created section/block to open the settings panel.

SettingsGuideCard.title: Settings in the theme editor
SettingsGuideCard.displayAsBullets: When checked, displays the value propositions beneath each other as bullets. Otherwise, displays them in one row beneath their icons.
SettingsGuideCard.textColor: Changes the color of the text of the value propositions
SettingsGuideCard.textSize: Changes the size of the text of the value propositions
SettingsGuideCard.backgroundColor: When set, shows a container with the given background color around the value propositions
SettingsGuideCard.backgroundCornerRadius: Rounds the corners of the background container. For square corners, set to 0px.
SettingsGuideCard.backgroundPadding: When set, adds padding around the value propositions inside the background container
SettingsGuideCard.iconSize: Changes the size of the icons
SettingsGuideCard.spaceBetween: Is only applied when there are multiple value propositions. When 'Display as bullets' is checked, this will be the space added between bullets. Otherwise, this will add space between the value propositions in the row.
SettingsGuideCard.iconFor: SVG icons are recommended since they load faster and have better quality. For best results with images, upload transparent PNG files.
SettingsGuideCard.textFor: To not display a value proposition, leave the text field empty.
